Description.Text:
Property Location
Spring Hotel Vulcano is in the heart of Arona, walking distance from Arona Pyramid and Las Vistas Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Veronicas Strip and Troya Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 371 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare. Additional amenities include a hair salon, shopping on site, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Spring Hotel Vulcano, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Spring Hotel Vulcano, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Spring Hotel Vulcano is in the heart of Arona, walking distance from Arona Pyramid and Las Vistas Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Veronicas Strip and Troya Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Arona Pyramid - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Veronicas Strip - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Troya Beach - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Golf Las Americas - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Siam Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Torviscas Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Puerto Colon - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Bobo Beach - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Del Duque Beach - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Camel Park - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 60.9 km / 37.8 mi

The preferred airport for Spring Hotel Vulcano is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
